user.title: Add OpenAI speech services
user.description: Provide configuration data. See documentation for further info.

data.base_url: Enter Base Url of OpenAI API Endpoint
data.tts_model: Select model to be used for text to speech
data.tts_voice: Select voice for text to speech
data.stt_model: Select model to be used for speech to text
data.stt_default_lang: Select default language to be used for speech to text
data.stt_temperature: Select temperature to be used for speech to text
data.stt_prompt: Select prompt to be used for speech to text

error.wrong_api_key: Connection was not authorized. Wrong or no API key provided.
